meta.title: Interference 2024
meta.subtitle: Foreign Interference Attribution Tracker
meta.og_description: The DFRLab's Foreign Interference Attribution Tracker (FIAT) is an interactive, open-source database that captures allegations of foreign interference relevant to the 2024 election.
